name: Scarlett De Bease
offering: Branding, Business Consulting, Image Consultant, Public Speaking, Speaker Organizations
what_you_do: Scarlett is a wardrobe stylist, personal shopper, speaker, and author.
who_you_serve: Women entrepreneurs who want to feel more confident and make more money by dressing better.
social_proof: Named the "Red Hot Image Maker" by Westchester Magazine, and author of the book "Stop Stressing About Dressing".
business_focus: Helping women entrepreneurs feel more confident and make more money by dressing better.
